title: Aggro
description: Two boys. One tragedy. Grief bonds us. The mystery of this murder will break us.My best friend was brutally ripped from this world, but her brother and boyfriend are still here. One of them wants to use me.The other wants to forget me.Both of them make me feel alive. We’ll find Violet’s murderer, no matter the cost. Two boys. One tragedy. Grief bonds us. Love will tear us apart.
author: Carrie Gray
